dict.acceptation: 高兴的；自鸣得意；（用于初次见面握手时）很高兴认识您；称心满意；
（使…）高兴( please的过去式)；（使…）满意；想要；喜欢；

sent.orig: I' m only too pleased ( very pleased) to help you.
sent.trans: 能够帮助你我非常高兴。

sent.orig: I am quite pleased with your success, your mother will be more pleased.
sent.trans: 我对你的成功感到非常高兴，你的母亲会更高兴。

sent.orig: He looks rather pleased with himself, ie pleased with what he has done.
sent.trans: 他看起来对自己做的事颇为得意。

sent.orig: Will the LORD be pleased with thousands of rams, with ten thousand rivers of oil?
sent.trans: 耶和华岂喜悦千千的公羊，或是千千万万的油河么。

sent.orig: Now the superpowers cannot wage war against other countries as they pleased in the past.
sent.trans: 现在超级大国不能像过去那样随心所欲地对别国发动哉争。
